about.title: About Me
about.text: I am a programmer who is passionate about software development, both web and design. I have carried out projects in which I have expressed my knowledge of code and code testing. I am in search of new challenges and constantly learning new knowledge.

services.title: Services
services.textOne: Your site will display properly on any device, including desktop computers, tablets and mobile phone.
services.textTwo: A good and attractive web design helps you keep your leads on your site, witch is the digital face of your business.
services.textThree: I know the importance of web design and can help you create website you'll love.
services.textFour: There are a lot of social platforms out there, and you should promote your presence on them on your website.
services.textFive: Retaining users is crucial to improving conversions. High-performing sites engage and retain users.
services.textSix: I will optimize your site with intelligent search engine optimization strategy to generate leads.
